description: The man waited for Samuel Paty, who showed Prophet Muhammad cartoons in class, and beheaded him.
title: France teacher attack: Suspect 'asked pupils to point Samuel Paty out'
title_page: France teacher attack: Suspect 'asked pupils to point Samuel Paty out' - BBC News
maintext: Students were said to be distraught at the brutal killing of a well-liked teacher. One father wrote on Twitter that his daughter "is in pieces, terrorised by the violence of such an act. How will I explain to her the unthinkable?"
